attributes.action: Give uk residents their rights to peacefully protest &  for injustice
attributes.additional_details: Because you are human and you work for us we as humans deserve to be treat fairly and animals have the right to be treat with respect
attributes.background: Give the uk residents their freedom and rights to fight for injustice and peacefully protest regarding police brutality & any other injustice that goes angainst humans and animals rights in the uk

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you would like to see the right to protest protected for UK citizens but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. A petition we have previously opened on this topic can be found here:

Do not restrict our rights to peaceful protest.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579012
